info.title: v2 - Ownership-CurrentownerHoldings
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter parameter supports expression based search; example: filerid eq 424.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Use to add or suppress the fields in the response. To include fields, type a field name seperated by comma; to exclude a field use !; example to exclude fields: !filerid.

parameters.name: filerids
parameters.description: Search by filerids, separated by comma.

parameters.name: ciks
parameters.description: Search data using single CIK or list of CIKs separated by comma. Example: 0001287145,000094982,0001097945, etc., numeric value only.

parameters.name: modifiedsince
parameters.description: Search data based on modified since date range; example: range - 20111001~20131001, or start date - 20141001.

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Parameter to filter the result set by IsDeleted.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit is used with paging to define the number of rows to return in a single call; use a number between 1 - 9999.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset is used with paging to define which page number to retrieve based on total numbers of rows and limit.

parameters.name: debug
parameters.description: Debug parameter helps developers investigate what happened during the call and what items were substituted if any during the call; select true to invoke debug parameter.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Sort can be used to sort the data as ASC or DESC; for example to sort by filerids enter filerids in this field followed by ASC for ascending order and DESC for descending order (pfilerids asc).

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Get the response in XML or JSON.
